Card_5_Description.en-US: Custom-tailored solution for your business needs
Card_5_Description.ru: Индивидульное решение для нужд вашего бизнеса

Founder_1_Photo_Alternative.en-US: A bald white man with glasses, dressed in a black suit jacket, leaning into chair and smiling.
Founder_1_Photo_Alternative.ru: Лысый белый мужчина в очках, одетый в чёрный пиджак, опирающийся на стул и улыбающийся.

Founder_2_Photo_Alternative.en-US: A white man with a shaved left side of the head and long hair on the right side, dressed in a black shirt with a dark gray tie, arms crossed and smiling brightly.
Founder_2_Photo_Alternative.ru: Белый мужчина с выбритой левой стороны головы и длинными волосами на правой стороне головы, одетый в чёрную рубашку с тёмно-серым галстуком, держащий руки скрещенными и широко улыбающийся.

Founder_1_Position.ru: Исполнительный директор, Основатель, Специалист по связи с общественностью

Founder_1_Biography.en-US: Lev Rassudov is an American University in Dubai graduate, with degree in Civil Engineering. Having worked in Wurth Group, an international company focusing on wholesale of construction materials, Lev had a chance to work on many landmark projects, such as EXPO 2020. This is where he found passion in business development and operations management, and desire for  building outstanding customer centric products.

Founder_2_Biography.en-US: German Shein is an American University of Sharjah graduate, who majored in Computer Engineering with a minor in Psychology. His first major industry experince started in IBM in 2017, where he worked as a Full Stack Developer for three years. His interests include both creative field and tech fields and he is a major foodie, who enjoys Chinese, Indian and Italian cuisines.

Founder_3_Biography.en-US: Hashim Noor graduated with a degree in Computer Science from the American University of Sharjah and worked as a Product Owner at IBM for 5 years. Hashim is passionate about building tech products that enable organizations to solve their business challenges
